Articles.Content:
All Stock 22.X VTOL 3-x engine's, 2 Vert., 1 Horz.

RSC controls the balance of brick on a needle point, "tricky..." I take off with, Brake on Vert. Engs. Aprox. 35%

Engage Horz. eng @ 200-300m.

Wow, nice work on this VTOL, I have never managed to get a VTOL to be stable, just fly around for 10 seconds and then crash, this seems stable enough,

nice work, really nice work! VTOL's are kinda hard as balance and center of thrust are the players here.
